bike.description: 6061 aluminum double-butted main frame, hydro-formed top tube for comfortable portage, 1 1/8-1.5" tapered head tube, PressFit 30 BB shell, 34.9mm seat tube, disc brake mounts, replaceable derailleur hanger, single eyelet

components.description: Jamis CX carbon composite fork, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, post disc brake mounts with integrated carbon cable cradle with stainless axle interfaces and fender eyelets
Ritchey Comp Drop-In, sealed bearing with nylon upper Compression ring, 1 1/8-1 1/2"
Alex XC23 eyeleted disc specific rim, 32H, Formula alloy disc road hubs and 14g stainless steel spokes
Shimano Tiagra RD-4600 GS rear and Tiagra FD-4600 front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Tiagra ST-4600 Dual Control STI, 20-Speed
FSA Omega compact double for PF30, 50/34T, 170mm (48/51) 172.5mm (54/56) 175mm (58/61)
BB7 Mechanical cable actuated disc brake with 160mm G2 CleanSweep rotors and Tiagra ST-4600 brake levers
Jamis suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Ritchey Road, 31.6 x 300mm, alloy clamp with cromo seat pin
Selle San Marco SPID with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
